verses.roman:
nānā-rūpe prītye kaila prabhura sevana
sei rātri tāhāṅ prabhu karilā vañcana

synonyms: nānā-rūpe—in various ways; prītye—on account of love; kaila—did; prabhura—of the Lord; sevana—service; sei rātri—that night; tāhāṅ—there; prabhu—Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; karilā—did; vañcana—passing.
translation: Because of their love for Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, they served Him in many ways, and that night the Lord stayed at the temple of Gopīnātha.
